catFacts: Cats sleep for 70% of their lives.
Adult cats only meow to communicate with humans.
A group of cats is called a clowder.
Cats can rotate their ears 180 degrees.
A cat's nose is as unique as a human fingerprint.
The average cat can jump up to six times its body length.
Cats have 230 bones in their bodies, while humans only have 206.
A cat's purring can help heal their bones and tissues.
The oldest known pet cat existed 9,500 years ago.
Cats have whiskers on the back of their front legs.
